ModMetaData.name: Safe Temperature
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Improves the safe temperature mechanic by forcing pawns to immediately drop what they're doing upon reaching serious temperature to go wait in a safe temperature area. Also forces them to stay in the safe temperature area until they are no longer shivering/initial heatstroke.
=== Updates === 03/20/2024: Update to 1.5 08/24/2023: Restricts safe temperature behavior to colonists only 07/18/2023: Allows pawns to perform work in safe temperature zones, allows player to manually assign jobs inside or outside of safe temperature zones. 07/14/2023: Allows player control while pawn is drafted.
